title: 5.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Design and code an app on Thunkable that displays the colors of the rainbow. The app should have seven buttons to display the seven different colors. Name the app as Rainbow Colors.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
